ground_truth.thought: 我想了解汽车贷款的保险要求。首先，获取我当前汽车贷款的详细信息。然后，查询贷款所需的保险类型和覆盖范围。接着，比较不同保险方案的保费和条款。最后，获取一些关于保险选择的金融建议。
ground_truth.name: AutoLoanInsurance.get_requirements

origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'AutoLoanInsurance.get_requirements', 'description': '获取汽车贷款的保险要求，包括保险类型、覆盖范围、保费比较和金融建议', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': '汽车贷款的详细信息'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'insurance_types', 'description': '贷款所需的保险类型'}, {'name': 'coverage', 'description': '保险覆盖范围'}, {'name': 'premiums', 'description': '不同保险方案的保费'}, {'name': 'financial_advice', 'description': '关于保险选择的金融建议'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.get_coordinates', 'description': 'Get the coordinates of a location.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'location', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the location need to get coordinates.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'latitude', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}]}, {'name': 'GoogleScholar.get_citation_format', 'description': "get APA citation format by an identification of organic result's id", 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'q', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'ID of an individual Google Scholar organic search result'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'citation', 'description': 'the citation format of the article'}]}, {'name': 'BINGMap.search_nearby', 'description': 'Search for places nearby a location, within a given radius, and return the results into a list. Put the location name at the end of the query.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search_term', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the place name'}], 'optional_parameters': [{'name': 'places', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'the name of the location.'}, {'name': 'latitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the latitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'longitude', 'type': 'FLOAT', 'description': 'the longitude of the location.'}, {'name': 'radius', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'radius in meters.'}], 'return_data': [{'name': 'places', 'description': 'the list of places, each place is a dict with name and address, at most 5 places.'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.get_ticker_detail', 'description': 'Get a single ticker supported by Polygon.io, with detailed information about the ticker and the company behind it', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'ticker', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': ''}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'address', 'description': 'company address'}, {'name': 'homepage_url', 'description': ''}, {'name': 'description', 'description': 'A description of the company and what they do/offer'}, {'name': 'list_date', 'description': 'The date that the symbol was first publicly listed'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}, {'name': 'PolygonFinance.search_stock_ticker', 'description': 'get the stock ticker given the company name', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'search', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'search for terms within the ticker and/or company name'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'ticker', 'description': 'The exchange symbol that this item is traded under'}, {'name': 'name', 'description': 'The name of the asset'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我正在考虑购买一辆新车，并计划申请汽车贷款。我需要了解汽车贷款的保险要求。首先，获取我当前汽车贷款的详细信息。然后，查询贷款所需的保险类型和覆盖范围。接着，比较不同保险方案的保费和条款。最后，获取一些关于保险选择的金融建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?

当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'q'的值是什么?

{'insurance_types': 'Comprehensive and Collision Insurance', 'coverage': 'Full coverage including liability, collision, and comprehensive', 'premiums': 'Varies based on the insurer and coverage level', 'financial_advice': 'Consider the total cost of ownership, including insurance premiums, when choosing a car and loan.'}
